reporter_caption.center: GREATAMERICA LEASING CORP. v. BOLIND, 00-1849 (Iowa App. 9-25-2002)

caption.center: GREATAMERICA LEASING CORPORATION, Appellee, v. ANNE E. BOLIND, d/b/a
IMPERIAL ANIMAL HOSPITAL and ANNE E. BOLIND, Appellants.

opinion.posture:
Appeal from the Iowa District Court for Linn County, PATRICK R. GRADY, Judge.
Contract obligor appeals denial of her petition to vacate default judgment and from award of attorney fees to contract obligee. AFFIRMED.
opinion.attorneys:
Anne E. Bolind, Imperial, Pennsylvania, for appellants pro se.
Randall D. Armentrout of Moyer Bergman, P.L.C., Cedar Rapids, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Considered by Sackett, C.J., and Vogel and Mahan, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
We find this matter should be affirmed. See Iowa R. App.P. 6.24. GreatAmerica Leasing Corporation's request for appellate attorney fees is denied.
AFFIRMED.
